name: Flipnote-player
tagline: Plays Flipnote Studio DSi files(ppm) from local storage or derectly from any hatena private server
body:
### Flipnote Player - by pbsds
![](http://i.imgur.com/D9MHecU.png)
Flipnote Player can play the flipnotes made on NDSi from local storage or directly from any hatena private server, like Sudomemo or any made using my [hatena server](https://github.com/pbsds/hatena-server), like [these](https://github.com/pbsds/hatena-server/wiki/Server-list) or [this one](http://gbatemp.net/threads/flipnote-hatena-server-for-dsi-by-pbsds.361279/page-3#post-5397530). Possibly from the real Hatena in the future aswell

Download(Source + win32 compile): here(WIP)
Source: [here](https://github.com/pbsds/Flipnote-Player)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
